title: Too Much Volcano
description: A fiery homage to Mount Aso, the largest active volcano in Japan
ingredients: El Charro Silver Tequila, Grapefruit Juice, Cointreau, Lime, Tonic, Spice!

title: Like A Magic Mule
description: Classic Moscow mule infused with a refreshing touch of lavender
ingredients: Vodka, Elderflower Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Creme De Violet, Ginger Beer, Love

title: Life Is Balloons
description: This delicious craft gin cocktail is bursting with juicy flavors
ingredients: Gin, Peach Liqueur, Orange Juice, Happiness

title: Go Fuck Yourself
description: Fresh ginger infused with a classic Margarita
ingredients: El Charro Silver Tequila, Lime Juice, Ginger Liqueur, Attitude

title: London Calling
description: A floral twist on gin tonic infused with the sweetness of elder flower
ingredients: Gin, Elderflower Liqueur, Lime, Tonic, Stoicism

title: Strangelove
description: A reimagining of the classic rum and coke with tantalizing cherry notes
ingredients: Plantation 3 Stars Rum, Heering Cherry Liqueur, Coke, Lemon, Soda Water

title: Budo Breeze
description: A super smooth grape cocktail to celebrate Japanese grape 'budo' season
ingredients: Vodka, Grape Liqueur, Crème de cassis, Grapefruit Juice, Caring

title: El Diablo
description: This devilish concoction is ironically a very good combination of berry and ginger
ingredients: El Charro Silver Tequila, Crème de Cassis, Lime Juice, Ginger Beer, Playfulness

title: Blue Monday
description: A soothing cocktail that pays tribute to calpico, a neglected ingredient as of late
ingredients: Vodka, Calpico, Lemon Juice, Blue Curacao, Soda Water

title: Easy Lover
description: A tropical delight that’s as refreshing as it is irresistible
ingredients: Plantation 3 Stars Rum, Cranberry Juice, Pineapple Juice, Grenadine, Sprite
